GSD.description:
ext4: fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.99 by commit 62e46e0ffc02daa8fcfc02f7a932cc8a19601b19. For more details please see the references link.
